channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Harvey Weinstein accuser Kaja Sokola is being sued for defamation. The plaintiff: Her sister
item.description: The sister of a Harvey Weinstein accuser who testified at the movie mogul's most recent trial has sued her sibling, saying her public remarks are dama...

item.title: Times Square to feature patriotic ball drop for New Year's Eve
item.description: The New Year's Eve ball drop in New York City will sparkle in red, white, and blue to kick off celebrations for the U.S.'s 250th birthday in 2026

item.title: Rain-soaked California still at risk of floods and high surf
item.description: A strong storm system that has brought relentless winds, rain and snowfall to California is expected to ease

item.title: Delaware State Police say DMV gunman let customers leave, fired at approaching officers
item.description: Investigators say a man accused of fatally shooting a Delaware State Police trooper at a DMV office allowed customers to leave and then fired at appro...

item.title: Man dead, 2 police officers hurt in shooting during custody exchange in North Carolina
item.description: Authorities say a man has been killed and two police officers hurt after a shooting during a child custody exchange in North Carolina
